description_for_human: Web3-native multi-model AI chat with Solana wallet auth and agent workflows.
description_for_model: ANUBIS AI Chat provides multi-model chat (GPT-5, GPT-5 Mini, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Claude 3.7, o4-mini, plus free OSS models), Solana wallet authentication, agent creation, and workflows. Use the OpenAPI spec to post messages and manage agents.
